long_description: The Field Pack Daypack is the simplest, most affordable pack from Poler for students and others on a tight budget. Padded tablet sleeve and 1 exterior pocket organize your stuff. Made of rugged 1000-denier Campdura nylon and lined with 420-denier nylon. Nylon webbing is the same super high-tensile-strength webbing used for seatbelts. Poler Field Pack daypack holds up to a 10 in. tablet or notebook computer, lunch and a jacket for your urban escapades.
short_description: The Field Pack Daypack is the simplest, most affordable pack from Poler for students and others on a tight budget. Padded tablet sleeve and 1 exterior pocket organize your stuff.
